Detailed Description

Represents a 4 dimensional vector.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

chaos::gfx::Vector4::Vector4 ( )

Default constructor.

Creates a new Vector4 with the x, y, z, and w components initialised as 0.

float  y,
float  z,

chaos::gfx::Vector4::Vector4 ( float  scalar)

Scalar constructor.

Creates a new Vector4 with the x, y, z, and w components to the given scalar.

Copy constructor.

Creates a new copy of the given Vector4.

Assignment operator.

Assigns the values of this Vector4 to be a copy of the values of the other given Vector4.

Parameters

bool chaos::gfx::Vector4::operator== ( const Vector4 &  other) const

Equality operator.

Compares whether this Vector4 and the other given Vector4 are considered "equal". A comparison of the component of the vector is performed using chaos::math::float_equals using the default values for delta_threshold and ulps_threshold.

Parameters
otherVector4 to compare this vector against.
Returns
Whether the vectors are considered equal.
bool chaos::gfx::Vector4::operator!= ( const Vector4 &  other) const

Inequality operator.

Compares this Vector4 and the other given Vector4 are not considered "equal". See Vector4::operator== for further information.

Parameters
otherVector4 to compare this vector against.
Returns
Whether the vectors are not considered equal.
